actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 99-395.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 298 - 109 (Record Vote No: 423).

official_title: A resolution providing for a motion to take the bill (H.R. 1562) to achieve the objectives of the Multi-Fiber Arrangement and to promote the economic recovery of the United States textile and apparel industry and its workers, from the Speaker's table and concur in the Senate amendment.

summary.text: Provides for consideration of a motion to take H.R. 1562 (textile imports) from the Speaker's table and concur in the Senate amendment thereto.

titles.title: A resolution providing for a motion to take the bill (H.R. 1562) to achieve the objectives of the Multi-Fiber Arrangement and to promote the economic recovery of the United States textile and apparel industry and its workers, from the Speaker's table and concur in the Senate amendment.
